raw:
Arnold: "I love dogs, they are my favorite animals."
Rachel: "I have a golden retriever and it is the best companion."
Sam: "I am allergic to dogs, unfortunately I can't have one as a pet."

sentences.text: "I love dogs, they are my favorite animals."
sentences.textPhonetics: "I lʌv dɔgz, ðeɪ ɑr maɪ feɪvərɪt ˈænəməlz."

sentences.text: "I have a golden retriever and it is the best companion."
sentences.textPhonetics: aɪ hæv ə ɡoʊldən rɪtriːvər ænd ɪt ɪz ðə bɛst kəmˈpænjən.

sentences.text: "I am allergic to dogs, unfortunately I can't have one as a pet."
sentences.textPhonetics: aɪ æm əˈlɜrdʒɪk tə dɑgz, ʌnˈfɔrtʃənɪtli aɪ kænt hæv wʌn æz ə pɛt.
